item.description:
Drew (Dr. Andrew Neblett, Ph. D) will be giving a lecture on Sunday, January 27
At 7:00 on numerous topics.

The topics will be include but not be limited to Spectal Energy Investigation,
Expulsion of negative Spectral Engery, Conscious Energy, Hypnosis and
other topics.

http://www.neblettonl...

www.neblettonline.com

We are getting together at a location that will only
Be given via e-mail and known to CT Paranormal members.

The members will arrive around 7:00.
The lecture will start around 7:30 and last an hour and a half.
There will be a half hour for Questions and Answers.

There will be coffee and other refreshments available.

I have heard Drew give lectures at the SGRA Paracon,
SGRA Halloween Festival and at the recent SGRA Winter Forum.

(SGRA = Smoking Gun Research Agency)

I think that members of Unknown Zone and CT Paranormal
Will enjoy this lecture.

CT Paranormal, please put this event up as one of your Meet Ups.

It there is bad weather, as there is at time time of year, then
This event will be cancelled and rescheduled.

I might add more to this RSVP at a later date.

The usual, RSVP Maybes will be allowed up to January 26.
The evening of January 26 Maybes will become No.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Drew Presentation of Spectral Energy Investigation and Expulsion
